events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday where another vehicle hit mine from behind causing damage to the bumper and rear lights.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and damage details submitted by the customer.
An insurance agent has been assigned to your case to guide you through the claim and handle all necessary communication.
Your claim for the car accident has been acknowledged. We are now processing the details to proceed with the next steps.
Please provide the police report, photographs of the vehicle damage, and medical reports if applicable for further investigation.
All requested documentation including accident photos, police report, and repair estimates have been submitted for review.
The investigation team has started reviewing all submitted evidence to validate the claim details and assess liability.
Investigation completed successfully, confirming that your vehicle was damaged due to another driverâ€™s negligence in the collision.
A settlement proposal has been prepared offering full coverage for your vehicle repairs as per the policy terms.
The customer has provided positive feedback on the promptness and professionalism during the claim handling process.
Your claim has been officially approved and is cleared for payment issuance based on the agreed settlement amount.
Payment covering the vehicle repair costs has been issued to your bank account. Please confirm receipt once credited.
The claim is now officially closed. We thank you for your cooperation and are here for any future assistance needed.
All claim files and documentation have been archived in compliance with company policy for record keeping and future reference.
